text: Erik Tandberg (October 19, 1932 – May 2, 2020) was a Norwegian engineer, politician, author, television personality and space educator. He was born in Oslo, Norway. He worked with Norwegian Space Centre. Tandberg was a member of the City Council of Oslo for the Conservative Party from 1969 to 1989. Tandberg died on May 2, 2020 in Oslo at the age of 87.Romfartsekspert Erik Tandberg er død ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Norwegian scientists Category:Aerospace engineers Category:Norwegian television personalities Category:Norwegian academics Category:Writers from Oslo Category:Politicians from Oslo
